column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This is a world-class museum
column2: comparable to the likes of the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Louvre. The Art Institute is a must-visit for any art lover in Chicago
column3: and has something for everybody. It's such a peaceful place and a good place to spend hours if you need a break from the world. Its rotating exhibits are often really good
column4: and I love stopping by as often as I can (not nearly as often as I'd like to) to check them out
column5: as well as walk through their collections of Islamic textiles
column8: and anything else you might imagine.
